amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that United States food assistance should be accepted by countries with large populations of individuals infected or living with HIV/AIDS, particularly African countries, in order to help feed such individuals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-80 that would expresses the sense of Congress that African nations that object to U.S. food aid on non-scientific grounds should accept this food assistance to improve nutrition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ballance amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
